mapper.sql: t.id, t.name, t.store, t.freeze_store, t.shelves_time, t.category_id, t.attribute, t.description, t.detail, t.cost, t.market_price, t.status, t.add_user, t.add_time, t.update_time, t.remark
mapper.delete: delete from goods where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into goods ( name, store, freeze_store, shelves_time, category_id, attribute, description, detail, cost, market_price, status, add_user, add_time, update_time, remark ) values( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freezeStore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shelvesTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update goods set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store = #{store,jdbcType=INTEGER}, freeze_store = #{freezeStore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shelves_time = #{shelvesTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attribute = #{attribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
